name: Pancake Panda
description: Pancakes are falling from the sky, and lethal syrup is steadily rising. You, a panda, attempt to survive.

name: Xavier's Adventure
description: Xavier hates his home, so he begins on his quest to find the great canyon and make his home at the top.

name: Ghosts
description: In this simple and pointless game, the first person to 10 wins. Ghosts is scarily addicting though, so watch out.

name: Rocket Bob
description: Bob is little monkey who's always wanted to go to the moon. Will you help him reach his goal in his little banana fueled rocketship? Don't get killed by an asteroid.
